evidence.text:
Person A: [Didi, when you go to college, don’t go so far. Just go to Stanford. You can live at home and I can cook for you if I haven’t died yet.]
Person B: Stop wearing my clothes.
Person A: [Look. What kind of mother allows their children to behave like this? You should really just let me raise them. This house is chaos. It’s a zoo.]
Person B: You beautiful! I love you!

Person A: I swear to god if you ever pee in my lotion again, I’m gonna period in your mouth.
Person B: [AI-YA! Not so close. I’m too ugly!]
Person B: [I fell...I was there for three hours. I call, I call. Nobody heard me...I just couldn’t stand up.]
Person B: ...try and be nice to Mom, okay?

Person A: [Take it! Take it!]
Person B: Umm...bye. I guess.
